author: Rajat Tripathi
title: Deepika Padukone DENIES attending the Oscars 2017 - watch video - Bollywoodlife.com
text:
Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Kangana Ranaut: Celebs spotted at the airport 
Speculations were rife that Deepika Padukone will walk the red carpet at the Oscars 2017. But she has refuted the rumours. Fans’ excitement knew no bounds when her stylist Elizabeth Saltzman posted on her Instagram that the actress will soon be joining her in LA. There are reports of a success party being held for xXx: Return of Xander Cage, Deepika’s debut Hollywood venture. In her Instagram story, Saltzman welcomed a friend at an airport and captioned it saying “Oscar here we come” and gave rise to the rumour that Deepika might be attending this year’s ceremony. 
Deepika , who will soon leave for LA, was present at an event in Mumbai. On being questioned by a journalist if she indeed was going to be present at the Academy Awards ceremony, she denied the rumours. Ouch! That is a heartbreak for all of us. We already started to imagine what would she wear, and had a few ensemble on our minds. 
But we still are excited about Deepika’s LA trip and the success bash for xXx: Return of Xander Cage. The pictures and videos from the party will definitely go viral on social media platforms. Also Read: Oscars 2017: Mahershala Ali in Moonlight, Dev Patel in Lion – who should win Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor? 
Now, all eyes are on Priyanka Chopra. She might attend the Oscars year as well. She was a presenter at the Oscars 2016, and has a movie, Baywatch, coming out in Summer 2017, and that is pretty much what is keeping our hopes and expectations are real high. No confirmation has been made by Priyanka or her team, so far. But we are all geared up for a surprise entry on February 26 by the Quantico star. We also hope that Deepika is just playing us, and shows up at the Oscars last minute. Just like how she surprised us with Golden Globes after-party appearan
